Encounter.Dialogue: Hello Operator, my name is MOCHI
Hello, Mochi! You don't have to call me operator
Hello Operator, my name is MOCHI
Hello, Mochi! You don't have to call me operator
Hello Operator, my name is MOCHI
Hello, Mochi! You don't have to call me operator
“Woah… this place is huge. Let’s start searching here. My great-granddad’s schematics could be anywhere. Hey, MOCHI! Come in!”
“Ok! Mobile OP Compact Hologram Initiator is ready to help!”
“Ok! MOCHI is ready to help, Operator.”
“And, my name is Ritsu. Just call me Ritsu.”
“Ok! Mobile OP Compact Hologram Initiator is ready to help, Operator!”
“I guess we’ll work on that later…”
